entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
